Footer.description: Strategic communication and campaign management for leaders who are not scared to stand out.

HomePage.heroTitle: WE DON'T FOLLOW THE NARRATIVE. WE WRITE IT.

Manifesto.text: We exist for the outliers. The ambitious few who understand that true influence isn't requested. It's engineered. We don't just build campaigns; we build legacies.

Arsenal.title: THE ARSENAL
Arsenal.step1Text: We dissect the status quo and identify the one unassailable point of leverage.
Arsenal.step2Text: This is where we architect the move that no one sees coming. A bespoke creative and strategic framework.
Arsenal.step3Text: We don't just participate. We engineer market or narrative dominance that endures.

Arena.title: THE ARENA
Arena.project1Client: A G7 NATION'S MINISTRY OF ENERGY
Arena.project2Title: FROM LEGACY BRAND TO DISRUPTIVE FORCE IN SIX MONTHS.

Filter.title: THIS IS NOT FOR EVERYONE.
forYouItems: You are prepared to be bold.
Your goal is to leave a legacy.
notForYouItems: You are searching for the lowest bidder.

FirstStep.title: THE CONVERSATION STARTS HERE.
FirstStep.text: We don't respond to RFPs. Our process begins with a single, intensive strategic consultation to see if we are a fit.

ServicesPage.title: Our Services
ServicesPage.serviceOneText: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. We define and deliver powerful messages to shape perception and build influence.
ServicesPage.serviceTwoText: From planning to execution, we manage high-stakes campaigns designed to achieve clear, measurable objectives.
ServicesPage.serviceThreeText: We provide expert counsel and rapid response to protect your reputation when it matters most.
